pullRequest.title: Made image HTML identical to AnkiDesktop when inserting
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose / Description
We previously used single quotes for inserting images, which caused issues when quoting the output in JavaScript.
Fixes
Fixes #5237
Approach
We use single quotes and no trailing slash, which is the same as AnkiDesktop.
How Has This Been Tested?
Unit Tests.
Image insertion still works.
Checklist

 You have not changed whitespace unnecessarily (it makes diffs hard to read)
 You have a descriptive commit message with a short title (first line, max 50 chars).
 Your code follows the style of the project (e.g. never omit braces in if statements)
 You have commented your code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
 You have performed a self-review of your own code

nodes.bodyText: jetbrains annotation? that seems odd - have I missed other of these? Seems we should have a system annotations package

commit.message:
Made image insert compatible with AnkiDesktop

Fixes #5237

We previously used single quotes for inserting images, which caused
issues when quoting the output in JavaScript.

This makes us compatible with the latest version of Anki Desktop (which
uses single quotes and no trailing slash).
